long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Amazon Shopping Buddy declutters your Amazon shopping experience. Open the side panel to compare products at a glance, organize tabs, and take note of what's important to you. Enjoy a simplified shopping experience with Amazon Shopping Buddy :). 

Watch the demo video or check out the official website for an overview https://www.amazonshoppingbuddy.com.
